query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fx_source_registry (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  sourceCode VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  nameAr VARCHAR(200) NULL,
  regimeTag ENUM('IRG', 'DFA', 'PAR') NOT NULL,
  apiEndpoint VARCHAR(500) NULL,
  schedule VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'weekly',
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
  lastRunAt DATETIME NULL,
  createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fx_gap_tickets (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  regimeTag ENUM('IRG', 'DFA', 'PAR') NOT NULL,
  gapType ENUM('missing_date', 'anomaly', 'stale_data') NOT NULL,
  gapStartDate DATE NOT NULL,
  gapEndDate DATE NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  descriptionAr TEXT NULL,
  status ENUM('open', 'resolved', 'ignored') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
  priority ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medium',
  createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  resolvedAt DATETIME NULL
);

INSERT IGNORE INTO fx_source_registry (sourceCode, name, nameAr, regimeTag, schedule) VALUES
('SRC-FX-ADEN', 'Central Bank of Yemen - Aden', 'البنك المركزي اليمني - عدن', 'IRG', 'weekly'),
('SRC-FX-SANAA', 'Central Bank of Yemen - Sanaa', 'البنك المركزي اليمني - صنعاء', 'DFA', 'weekly'),
('SRC-FX-PARALLEL', 'WFP/FAO Parallel Market Survey', 'مسح السوق الموازي - برنامج الأغذية العالمي', 'PAR', 'daily');
